rules.name: The Lion's Choler
rules.description: The Lion gains a bonus to Focus Rolls when he is wounded.dent While a Model with this Special Rule is engaged in a Challenge, if it has 2 or fewer Wounds remaining, its Controlling Player can select the following Gambit: The Lion's Choler: If this Gambit is selected, the Model for which this Gambit has been selected's Controlling Player adds a +2 Modifier to the Focus Roll, and does not suffer a -1 modifier for each point of difference between this Model's Base Wounds Characteristic and its current Wounds Characteristic.

rules.name: Sire of the Dark Angels
rules.description:
If a Model with this Special Rule is part of an Army, then the Controlling Player may apply the following additional Special Rules to all Auxiliary, Apex and Primary Detachments that have the same Faction Trait as the Model with this Special Rule: 


If four or more Troops Battlefield Role Slots in the Primary Detachment of this Army are filled and these Slots contain at least one Tactical Squad Unit, at least one Assault Squad Unit and at least one Breacher Squad Unit, then all Force Organisation Slots with the Troops Battlefield Role in the Primary Detachment are considered Prime Slots 


Furthermore, if a Model with this Special Rule is part of an Army, then the following Special Rules are granted to all Outrider Squadron Units and all Scimitar Jetbike Squadron Units in the same Army: 


When the Controlling Player of a Model with this Special Rule makes a Reserve Roll for a Outrider Squadron Unit which only includes Models with the Dark Angels Trait or a Scimitar Jetbike Squadron Unit which only includes Models with the Dark Angels Trait, that Roll is modified by +1.

rules.name: Stasis grenades
rules.description:
Stasis grenades reduce the Combat Initiative of enemies. 


Once per Battle, the first time a Model with stasis grenades and any Unit that it has joined is successfully Charged, the Combat Initiative of all Models in the Charging Unit is modified by -2 for the duration of the current Assault Phase. This modifier does not affect Models in the Charging Unit that are engaged in a challenge.

selectionEntryGroups.name: This Model may have its The Lion Sword exchanged for one The Wolf Blade for free.

rules.name: Armour of the Forest
rules.description:
This Wargear reduces the amount of Damage suffered from any wound inflicted in a Challenge.

When a Model with this Special Rule is engaged in a Challenge, the Damage Characteristic of any wound inflicted on that Model is reduced by 1, to a minimum of 1.

rules.name: Ancient of War
rules.description: While Marduk Sedras is part of a Unit that includes only Models with the Dark Angels Trait, all Models in the Unit gain the Hatred (Traitor) Special Rule.

selectionEntryGroups.name: For every five Models in this Unit, one Interemptor's plasma burner may be exchanged for one of the following:

rules.name: Order Exemplars
rules.description: When a Unit that includes any Models with this Special Rule is selected as part of a Detachment, during Army selection, a single option from the Orders of the Hekatonystika presented below must be selected for all Models in that Unit.

selectionEntryGroups.name: Orders of the Hekatonystika
selectionEntryGroups.comment:
.Icons of Resolve: When part of a Unit that is successfully Charged by an enemy Unit, Models with the Order
Exemplars Special Rule set their Leadership Characteristic to 10 for the duration of the current Assault Phase.
Slayers of Kings: Whilst part of a Unit that is Locked in Combat with an enemy Unit that includes at least one
Model with a Weapon Skill Characteristic of 6 or higher, the Attacks Characteristic of Models with the Order
Exemplars Special Rule may be set to 1. If this option is used then the Terranic greatswords those Models have
gain the Critical Hit (6+) Special Rule until the Combat ends.
Hunters of Beasts: Whilst part of a Unit that is Locked in Combat with an enemy Unit that includes one or more
Models with a Toughness Characteristic of 6 or higher, the Damage Characteristic of Wounds caused by a Model
with this Special Rule is modified by +1.
Reapers of Hosts: Whilst part of a Unit that is Locked in Combat with one or more enemy Units that
outnumbers it, then all Models in that Unit with the Order Exemplars Special Rule modify their Attacks
Characteristic by +1.
Breakers of Witches: Whilst part of a Unit that is Locked in Combat with an enemy Unit that has one or more
Models with the Malefic Sub-Type or Psyker Trait, Hit and Wound Tests made for Models with the Order
Exempla Special Rule in that Combat are modified by +1.

rules.name: Augurs of Weakness
rules.description: When making attacks targeting a Unit that includes one or more Models with the Vehicle Type, Models with the Order Exemplars Special Rule gain the Armourbane Special Rule.

rules.name: Icons of Resolve
rules.description: When part of a Unit that is successfully Charged by an enemy Unit, Models with the Order Exemplars Special Rule set their Leadership Characteristic to 10 for the duration of the current Assault Phase.

rules.name: Slayers of Kings
rules.description: : Whilst part of a Unit that is Locked in Combat with an enemy Unit that includes at least one Model with a Weapon Skill Characteristic of 6 or higher, the Attacks Characteristic of Models with the Order Exemplars Special Rule may be set to 1. If this option is used then the Terranic greatswords those Models have gain the Critical Hit (6+) Special Rule until the Combat ends.

rules.name: Hunters of Beasts
rules.description: Whilst part of a Unit that is Locked in Combat with an enemy Unit that includes one or more Models with a Toughness Characteristic of 6 or higher, the Damage Characteristic of Wounds caused by a Model with this Special Rule is modified by +1.

rules.name: Reapers of Hosts
rules.description: Whilst part of a Unit that is Locked in Combat with one or more enemy Units that outnumbers it, then all Models in that Unit with the Order Exemplars Special Rule modify their Attacks Characteristic by +1.

rules.name: Breakers of Witches
rules.description: Whilst part of a Unit that is Locked in Combat with an enemy Unit that has one or more Models with the Malefic Sub-Type or Psyker Trait, Hit and Wound Tests made for Models with the Order Exempla Special Rule in that Combat are modified by +1.

selectionEntryGroups.name: Any Model in this Unit may have its Calibanite warblade exchanged for one of the following:

rules.name: Cytheron pattern aegis
rules.description: A Model with a Cytheron pattern aegis has a 5+ Invulnerable Save and gains the Shield Trait. In addition, the Controlling Player of a Unit that includes any Models with a Cytheron pattern aegis may declare the Shieldwall! Advanced Reaction for that Unit. This is an exception to the normal Rules for the Shieldwall! Advanced Reaction.

rules.name: Companions
rules.description: Companion Detachments oath themselves to their charge, ensuring their continued survival on the battlefield, even at cost of their own lives. While a Model with both the Dark Angels Trait and either the Paragon Type or Command Sub-Type is part of a Unit that includes any Models with this Special Rule, Precision Wounds caused as part of a Shooting Attack cam be allocated to that Model.

sharedRules.name: The Angels of Death
sharedRules.description:
Negative modifiers to Dark Angels' Leadership, Willpower, Cool and Intelligence are limited. 


Models with this Special Rule may never have their Leadership Characteristic modified to less than 6. Additionally, any variant of the Fear (X) Special Rule may only reduce the Leadership, Willpower, Cool and Intelligence Characteristics of any Model with this Special Rule by a maximum of 1, regardless of the value of X.
